title: Tom Horton (rugby union)
text: Tom Horton (born 18 April 1997 in <a href="Australia">Australia</a>) is an <a href="Australian">Australian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who plays for the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Waratahs">NSW Waratahs</a> in <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a>. His playing position is <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a>. He has signed to the Waratahs squad for the 2020 season.
